:: Silvorbolt ::

:: Flies out of the base towards the lake. While in the air, Silvorbolt 
starts thinking. ::

I am so... so...  empty. Nothing to do, no more than dead weight. Cannon 
fodder. Liono using magic. No need for me. Tigerhawk questioning Liono. No 
need for me. Bluestinger and the smileys. No need for me. Black 
Arachinia........

:: A deep pain suddenly strikes Silvorbolt. ::

No........ need..... for...... me. Why go on?

:: Silently transforms to beast mode and stops flapping. ::

Why..........

:: Starts to go down right into the lake, saying the words....::

why go on.........
